@graph.headline: Outstation Cabs from Varanasi — Innova Crysta, Ertiga, SUVs & Tempo Traveller (6–12 Seater)
@graph.description: Daily outstation cabs from Varanasi: Innova Crysta, Ertiga, SUVs & Tempo Traveller (6–12 seater) with luggage carrier, GST invoice, fares, routes & FAQs.

mainEntity.name: Can I choose 6 or 7 seats in Innova?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. We log your preference (captain seats vs bench) during booking based on availability.

mainEntity.name: How do you count distance—garage to garage or pickup to drop?

acceptedAnswer.text: Industry standard is garage-to-garage; your quote will show the assumed start/return point.

mainEntity.name: Can I add a luggage carrier for Innova/Ertiga/SUV?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, request outstation cab with luggage carrier Varanasi while booking so we arrange the right rack and rain cover.
Yes—WhatsApp estimate, trip sheet, and GST invoice on eligible bookings.

mainEntity.name: What if my plan changes mid-trip?

acceptedAnswer.text: Tell your chauffeur and message dispatch—fare adjusts transparently to actual km/days.
